name: Board (itch)
description:
High above the mountains...

Race your way down a mountain accumulating score as you go! Can you get enough to progress?

Explore the landscape to seek out the golden and red gems!

Can you achieve the highest rank?

Controls W, S, Up/Down arrow (on ground)
Move forwards and backwards
A, D, Left/Right arrow (on ground)
Move left and right (the faster you move forwards the faster you turn!)
W, S (in air)Rotate to do front and back flips!
A, D (in air)
Move left and right and also rotate!
Space (on ground, and speed boost available)
Gain a boost of speed!
R (whilst in level)
Reset the level!
Thanks for playing!

Board was created over five or so weeks by myself for a university module. At this stage the game is unlikely to receive any further updates.

(Collecting the yellow and red gems, unlocking Hobo bill, and scoring the lowest time as possible are the only challenges present in the game; there is also only one level. I hope you enjoyed your time with Board!)
